GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.17.13
GSD.description:
exfat: check if cluster num is valid

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit 7c58b14b6f9cde9f69e7fa053ab73f6e013a7131, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 1e49a94cf707204b66a3fb242f2814712c941f52. For more details please see the references link.
